1.content: What kind of dragon do see yourself?
1.title: Who are you

choices: Aqua: Oceanic city of the water type dragon
The Ivory: nature friendly city in the forest
Crystal: ice type dragon located in the artic area
you pick a land and a dragon type
11.content: You and your human people live in peace and coexist with other dragons of the land. where are you from?
11.title: Peacful

choices: Another dragon dragon challenges you
you decide to throw a beach party
continue to laze around
111.content: You are lying on the beach, while the water gently licking your front claws. you yawn a loud lazy yawn with no care in the world. It's been rather peaceful in your part of the dragon realm. Your people have been doing rather well with your leadership and the weather was quite beautiful. Man if only something would happen...after thinking about this you have to be careful what you wish for.
111.title: Aqua: Oceanic city of the water type dragon

choices: The blue gems are; I am an out casted male among the other male dragons.
The silver gems are; I am a female that lives with the forest.
112.content:
The Ivory such a beautiful city and one not ruled by terror; for they are guarded by their protector a great dragon the namesake of their great city. Their protector only comes to them in times of great need, yet only a chosen one may call upon the protector. As the days pass a troubling figure in approaching the city, out of concern the city's counsel calls upon their chosen citizen a small child only seven years of age. The counsel send the child away to do the calling but the chosen one has to be careful to call the protector the correct way or have the consequence of calling another dragon. The child approaches the, alter where, any other chosen ones have called upon the protector age's ago; on the, alter there is a pale blue blow with green flames to the right of it are blue gems to the left are silver gems.
Which of these gems you’re calling?
112.title: The Ivory: nature friendly city in the forest

choices: Visit the bakery
Talk with your people
wish to lay in the city center to see what else is going on
113.content: As you gaze down into the snow valley as your people start to prepare for the harvest month you can't help,but to smile at their hard work. You see the smoke stacks coming from the bakery, smelling the delicious treats they might be preparing. Ah! and the wonderful feast they prepare in your honor for such a good season. You slowly climb down from your perch on top of a small hill where they have built you a lovely home. with a swish of your tail and a spring of your legs you jump down to walk around town.
113.title: Frosty: ice type dragon located in the artic area

choices: Give a small motivating speech
Explain you just wanted to watch and ask the guards to break it up
Explain you just wanted to speak with a few people
1132.content: You decide to mingle with your human people. After all they are the reason for you being treated like a queen. As you trot down the street heading toward the town center. All they while you keep a steady gait people are stopping to kneel, bow, and greeting you with "Good morning mistress". You slightly dip your head to your towns folk. As you near the center your icy chair that you use when your people wish to explain their problems to you and your few other dragon brethren who choose to follow you. Not the moment you sit down a crowd gathers. The people must think you wanted to make an an announcement. A two dragons who were near by, quickly came to your side. As you sat there over looking the small crowd who were eagerly starring and waiting for your wise speech.
1132.title: Talk with your people

choices: It is a concern
A complement or offer of assistance with the party.
11321.content: "My loving people", You start off. "we are nearing the start of Summer one of the few times of the year we get sun raining down upon our small town and to show my appreciation for you lovely people, I will be hosting a festival outside my palace; in the courtyard. I will be most pleased if you join me at daybreak at my festival for being good citizens of Artica!" The crowd cheered upon hearing the event coming soon and rushed off to begin preparations for you festival. Meanwhile you sat on your haunches in your chair with you tail tucked next to your thigh as the queue of concerns sprawled out before you.
11321.title: Give a small motivating speech

choices: Pack up the festival. We must defend
He was a crazed fool. No way the desert would invade. next concern.
113211.content:
It wasn't just any concern, this man seemed to be armored for war. What is he doing in your town? He doesn't seem like he was from your town.
The man bows in a sarcastic manner, "My lady Crystal. I was sent here with a message from the sandy dessert!," The man reached into his pack and pulled out three heads, all wearing your royal helmets. "They have sent me and said it's time that some one replaced you on your throne. Reinforcements be here tomorrow!," With a smirk he turns to leave, but before he even takes his first step one of your dragon followers exhales an ice spike deep into his back. The stranger collapses onto his side. You look out into the crowd and see their concerned faces. You open your maw...
113211.title: It is a concern

choices: There is a accident at the bakery quick help them!
A nice peaceful day
11322.content: Gently you nudge the dragon to your left who gazes over to you, "Excuse me Scrawl can you explain to them I just wish to observe?" Scrawl nods and steps forward " Alright people Crystal just wants to see how her people are doing and remember concerns will be at four today." Scrawl takes his place back next to you. "Thank you Scrawl." "Anything for you my queen."
11322.title: Explain you just wanted to watch and ask the gu...

choices: the lead takes you directly to the library
the lead leads you to a clue to possibly the library's true location.
114.content: A white male dragon named (your/name) who wanders the world seeking knowledge and wisdom. But you do not travel alone. A twin sister named Sarah travels with you. She may be annoying at times but is a great aid when truely needed. Your kind have a order of knowledge seekers. Many have set out to learn what they can from single cultures. But you and your sister have dreamed bigger than others. To find the lost library. An ancient library filled with endless knowledge from all cultures, ancient records, legends and prophecies. Right know you and your sister are in the middle of a desert following a lead to the library.
114.title: a wandering white dragon who belongs to no land

choices: Sandstorm!
1142.content: You and your sister have been walking through the desert for quit some time now. Both of you are very tired. "Hey (your/name) can we take a break I'm exhausted?" "Same here. Maybe we should rest at that oasis over there. Or is that a mirage?" "No that real. There a man with a camel over there. Maybe he can help us." As soon as you and your sister get to the oasis you plop yourself down in the shade while your sister talks to the man. When she comes back she tell you "Brother we're very close to the marking on the map. Also he said it might be the Spinx that's really close." "A Spinx this might get interesting. Luckily I can read hieroglyphics."
1142.title: A Spinx?

choices: go left
go right
11421.content:
You feel the warm desert wind pick up quit rapidly as you see a very large dust cloud racing towards you. You hurrily get to your feet in order to not get trapped in storm. "Maybe we should get going Sarah." "What makes you say that?" "That dust storm over there that's heading towards us." She turns around and spots it. "Oh. Well I know way to the Spinx lets go." You quickly follow your sister to the Spinx. Both you and your sister get inside just as the storm gets to you. But then door back out seals shut. You then look down and that your standing on a pressure pad. You lift your foot off of it and move away slowly from it. Then torches start lighting up the room revilling a large tablet with rising out of the ground and mounting itself to a wall. You feel very creeped out by this. "Ah Sarah are you as creeped out as I am." "With the tablet? Yeah I am a little. But aren't you going to read what's on it though?" "Well I probably should. It might have something about the library on it." You then walk cautiously over to the tablet. When your in front of it you begin to translate it.
"Two of white.
Guided by the light.
Who always choose to do what is right.
Both family.
Brother and sister.
Both from a ancient tribe.
Reincarnated from the past.
Will do once more as they did in the last.
Those who seek the knowledge your trials begin here.
Retrieve the mask from within.
So the true shale begin.
Return the mask to the pedestal.
That's in the middle.
Only then more will be reviled."

"Well at least this gives us something to do while we wait for things to calm down outside." You turn towards a a door way that has just opened. You take a few steps inside. Before your sister says "If your going I'm coming with you." "Okay then you usually do anyway." So you two continue you way down the passage until you hit a fork that goes left or right.
11421.title: Sandstorm!

choices: check where you came down
push forwards to try and find another exit
114211.content:
"Hmm which way?" "How about left." "Ok then left it is then." The two of you start heading down the left corridor. Each step they took seemed to light another torch ahead of them. "Ok I really got to emit that the thing with the torches is really cool." "I actually got agree with that but I find the Colorado they burn really interest. Seriously this one is purple." Sarah said. Then the floor seemed open up but only below your feet causing you to fall down a long dark pit. Sarah tried to catch you but failed. "Help. Somebody please. Anybody." You hear come farther down the hole. You start to see the bottom so you spread your wings in order to slow down. You managed to land softly on a slope. "Hey you!" You quickly scan the area and see nothing. This puzzles you greatly. "Look a little more to the left. A little more. Now look up."

You then spot a man with a weird pendent around his neck hanging upside down by a vine wrapped around his legs. He doesn't seem to be from around any where you've been. "Can you cut me down I've been stuck like this for a few hours now." You start moving cautiously towards him. The his pendent starts to slip off you watch as he desperately tries to catch it. "No no no. Damit." As the pendent slips out of his reach and hits the ground. His body begins to glow and Morph into a dragon like form while still keeping some man like qualities. The glowing then stopped leaving a creature with pale blue and crimson red scales in a stripped pattern. "Hey are you daydreaming or something? Cause I would like to get back on my feet. But if your no hurry it's not LIKE I want to be on my feet any time soon." "Hold your horses I'm going to cut you down." You then unegarly cut him down. He winds up falling on his head. He then quickly rises to his feet while picking up his pendent in the process. "You know what take this stupid mask my pendent told me to grab for dealing with me and my mood." He hands you a mask of bronze and gold with a black jewel on its fore head before he just runs off out of sight. You begin to wonder what the hell was that. Well at least you possibly got the mask. Now only to get back up there.
114211.title: left

122.content: You gleam down at your suffering little city as they are desperate for water. since they haven't brought you a monthly sacrifice you think to hold of till they do. you give off a smirk and strike a lightning bolt at a random house just to see what calamity you could cause. You roar in satisfaction when...
122.title: Desstrea: electric type off in a dessert

Miasma another twisted female dragon that uses poison

124.title: Pick a land and dragon type

choices: You awake as Drakus on a good day
You awake as Drakus on a bad day
1241.content: Drakus, the warped dragon who uses fear to keep his people in line. as much as he loves toying and torturing his people; they actually like to stay under his wings. Some legends say Drakus is the spawn of the Devil, or Hades, or any underworld you believe in. The truth is just because his power focuses around darkness and nightmares in the shadows doesn't mean he is as evil as most say. He can be a fair ruler on the best of days, it is just his nasty temper why people fear him.
1241.title: Drakus the dark dragon who feeds and breeds nig...

choices: Creep around the town as a cloud of shadows and scare you people
Look into peoples dreams and put them in nightmares they cant escape.
12412.content: You wake up as if you woke up on the wrong side of the cave. Barking orders at people ordering sentences without trials( or if the accused was innocent). The day just felt like a nasty thorn stuck between your talons and felt your people needed to pay for it.
12412.title: You awake as Drakus on a bad day

134.content: As you slowly walk through the high mountains keeping your distance from the volcano lands, but high enough to view the rest of the worlds. feeling sad and lonely you gaze down at the peaceful forest who hate you because of your father, the lord of the desert. you hear a faint roar and a silhouette of a dragon land next to you. It's
134.title: Electric type

choices: your brother
your best friend- traitor

The fire dragon sneers. It's red scales and blue fiery eyes holds a sense of familiarity.

It's...

info.brief_description: Make your own dragon and do your best or worst for the land
info.description: Welcome to the land of Scaret where dragons rule over the land do what you will with the land for it is yours. Dragons are 13 ft. tall and 21 ft. long quadruped. What ever dragon type you are that's your color and breath type. example the ice dragon is white and has a nasty ice breath. all except the nature dragon who doesn't have breath type. The Electric type is blue as well as its lightning.The peaceful holds are female except the forest and the aggressive holds are male except for the electric cliffs.
